bigboat_status_measurement.description: A measurement of a BigBoat status metric.

name.description: Name of the health status metric.

checked_time.description: Moment when the health status was measured.

ok.description: Whether the health status is considered good, and does not impact the performance of the BigBoat dashboard.

value.description: Value of the health status metric. This is `null` if there is no numeric value for the metric or it is unknown.

max.description: Maximum reachable value of the health status metric. This is `null` if there is no numeric maximum for the metric or it is unknown.
